text: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ أَفَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَـٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَٱسْتَكْبَرْتُمْ وَكُنتُمْ قَوْمًا مُّجْرِمِينَ

translation.en.sahih: But as for those who disbelieved, [it will be said], "Were not Our verses recited to you, but you were arrogant and became a people of criminals?
translation.id.indonesian: Dan adapun orang-orang yang kafir (kepada mereka dikatakan): "Maka apakah belum ada ayat-ayat-Ku yang dibacakan kepadamu lalu kamu menyombongkan diri dan kamu jadi kaum yang berbuat dosa?"
